price: A saudação a estes, um dia, quando O depararem será: "Salam!", Paz! E Ele já lhes preparou generoso prêmio.
arabic: تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ سَلَٰمٞۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَرِيمٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: taḥiyyatuhum yawma yalqawnahu salāmun wa-aʿadda lahum ajran karīman
